steps.name: User login to the application url "https://www.cleartrip.com/"

elements.name: Validation of flight booking in ClearTrip portal

steps.name: User select Round Trip radio button in Search Flight screen
User enter Departure city in "Bangalore" and Destination place in "New Delhi" textfield
User select Departure Date as "18" and Return Date as "24"
User click on Search Flight button
User select Non Stop flights and click on Book button
